mapper.select: SELECT PROCESS_DEFINITION_KEY, BPMN_PROCESS_ID, NAME, TENANT_ID, VERSION_TAG, VERSION FROM PROCESS_DEFINITION WHERE PROCESS_DEFINITION_KEY = #{processDefinitionKey} AND version = #{version}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROCESS_DEFINITION (PROCESS_DEFINITION_KEY, BPMN_PROCESS_ID, NAME, TENANT_ID, VERSION_TAG, VERSION) VALUES (#{processDefinitionKey}, #{bpmnProcessId}, #{name}, #{tenantId}, #{versionTag}, #{version})
